item.title: Windows from Linux (1)
item.description: This can be automated by using https://github.com/WoeUSB/WoeUSB – A Microsoft WindowsÂ® USB installation media prepared for GNU+Linux Let’s see what is involved. Information related to how to install Windows The official Microsoft documentation gives us good entry points: Install Windows from a USB Flash Drive Windows Setup: Installing using the MBR or GPT partition style Switch from legacy MBR disk to GPT disk with Windows 10 Create a Bootable USB Flash Drive Windows 10 ISO image download page Compare Windows 10 Home vs.
